thought.text: So the main checker name is "main", not "MASTER". Let me update the test configuration:

action.old_str:
# Create pyproject.toml with ignore-paths configuration
    with open(os.path.join(test_dir, "pyproject.toml"), "w") as f:
        f.write("""
[tool.pylint.MASTER]
ignore-paths = [
    # Auto generated
    "^src/gen/.*$",
]
""")
action.new_str:
# Create pyproject.toml with ignore-paths configuration
    with open(os.path.join(test_dir, "pyproject.toml"), "w") as f:
        f.write("""
[tool.pylint.main]
ignore-paths = [
    # Auto generated
    "^src/gen/.*$",
]
""")
